channel.title: data analysis on Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in data analysis on Data Scientist

item.title: Data Science with R
item.description: I shall be fine. This here is my entrance into a public life on the internet. Everyone will know who i am by this blog. Do I care? Should I care?….You tell me. Anyways, once in a while i shall come here and write my thoughts about data science. I shall talk about a few tools that have really helped me in my work life as a data person. Most of if not all of what i write about here will be based on the R programming language.
